results.title: [Effect of therapy with lisinopril on the state of cerebral blood flow in women with hypertension in peri- and postmenopause].
results.text_hl: Studies were performed before treatment, after acute test with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and in 1 month of therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.
